code: import{createSelector}from"reselect";var getUsersSelector=function getUsersSelector(state){return state.usersPage.users;};export var getUserListPageSize=function getUserListPageSize(state){return state.usersPage.userListPageSize;};export var getUsersTotalCount=function getUsersTotalCount(state){return state.usersPage.usersTotalCount;};export var getUserListCurrentPage=function getUserListCurrentPage(state){return state.usersPage.userListCurrentPage;};export var getIsShowPreloader=function getIsShowPreloader(state){return state.usersPage.isShowPreloader;};export var getDisabledUserListFollowButton=function getDisabledUserListFollowButton(state){return state.usersPage.disabledUserListFollowButton;};export var getUsers=createSelector(getUsersSelector,getIsShowPreloader,function(users,isShowPreloader){return users.filter(function(u){return true;});});
